companies.name: Google
companies.description: A leading technology company specializing in internet-related services and products.

values.title: Focus on the user
values.description: All of our products are designed with the user in mind.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We strive to push the boundaries of what's possible.

values.title: Open Culture
values.description: We believe in transparency and sharing knowledge.

interviewProcess: Technical phone screen with engineer (45-60 minutes)
Virtual onsite with 4-5 interviews (45 minutes each)
companies.culture: Google's culture emphasizes innovation, collaboration, and impact. The company maintains a startup-like atmosphere despite its size, encouraging employees to spend 20% of their time on side projects that could benefit Google.
companies.notes: Known for rigorous interview process focusing on algorithms, system design, and coding skills. Preparation in these areas is crucial.

companies.name: Meta
companies.description: Building technologies to help people connect, find communities, and grow businesses.

values.title: Move Fast
values.description: Quick iteration and rapid development are key to innovation.

values.title: Be Bold
values.description: We encourage taking calculated risks and learning from failures.

values.title: Be Open
values.description: We believe in transparent communication and sharing information.

interviewProcess: Virtual onsite with 4 interviews (45 minutes each)
companies.culture: Meta emphasizes moving fast and taking risks. The company values individual impact and encourages employees to think big and take ownership of projects that can affect billions of users.
companies.notes: Strong focus on coding skills and system design in interviews. Meta is known for its 'move fast' culture and emphasis on shipping code quickly.
